titleStmt.title: The baptizing of a Turke A sermon preached at the Hospitall of Saint Katherin, adioyning vnto her Maiesties Towre the 2. of October 1586. at the baptizing of one Chinano a Turke, borne at Nigropontus: by Meredith Hanmer, D. of Diuinitie.
titleStmt.author: Hanmer, Meredith, 1543-1604.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Walde-graue dwelling without Temple-barre,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
